issue.title: Is the new simulator working for anyone?

content.raw:
@{557058:42fc2023-4935-4b2e-8079-075649866124} You already indicated that you’re running from catkin install.  However, were you previously using the docker installation as well?

And, does error trace occur during the launch or when you exit \(ctrl-c\)?  If it's the former, then that is why you see the Ignition window coming up with white canvas only and we need to figure out why you are getting that failure.
content.html:
@baila You already indicated that you’re running from catkin install. However, were you previously using the docker installation as well?

And, does error trace occur during the launch or when you exit (ctrl-c)? If it's the former, then that is why you see the Ignition window coming up with white canvas only and we need to figure out why you are getting that failure.
